title: Relates to the examination of certain witnesses
summary: Relates to the examination of certain witnesses; provides for an order directing examination of a witness conditionally be based upon the ground that such witness is mentally ill and thereby incapacitated as a result or elderly and possessing a restricted capacity to either ambulate or adequately focus attention on specific events or occurrences.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to examination of certain witnesses
